definition: to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: AIDS is an acronym for"Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome."
sentences.chinese: 艾滋病的全称是“获得性免疫缺损综合征”。

sentences.english: Methods: The data of 52 COPD cases iatrogenic pneumonia were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对52例医院获得性念珠菌肺炎病人进行分析。

sentences.english: Acinetobacter has become a major pathogen for nosocomial infection.
sentences.chinese: 不动杆菌是医院获得性感染的主要致病菌之一。

sentences.english: Vaccinations work by activating the host's adaptive immunity in advance of infection.
sentences.chinese: 接种疫苗的机理是在感染之前激活宿主获得性免疫。

sentences.english: For the poor, access and affordability are usually one and the same.
sentences.chinese: 就穷人而言，获得性和可承受力通常属于同一问题。

sentences.english: Most of the children had acquired the pneumococcal infection while in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 大多数儿童在医院获得性感染了肺炎链球菌。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the serum histamine-releasing activity of patients with primary acquired cold urticaria (PACU).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨原发性获得性寒冷性荨麻疹的组胺释放活性。

sentences.english: In terms of improving access to medicines, price and quality go hand in hand.
sentences.chinese: 在改进药品的获得性方面，价格和质量齐头并进。

sentences.english: Acquired genetic abnormalities account for 85% to 90% of breast cancers.
sentences.chinese: 获得性基因异常占乳癌的85%至90%。
